name: Grat 320mg tablet
description: Gemifloxacin which belongs to the quinolone class of antibiotics. It works by inhibiting the multiplication of bacteria within the body. It is used to treat various bacterial infections such as pneumonia (respiratory bacterial infection), prostatitis (inflammation of prostate gland), pyelonephritis (inflammation of kidney tubules), cystitis (inflammation of bladder), bronchitis (inflammation of lining of airway passages), gonococcal infection (sexually transmitted bacterial infection), plague etc.
label: medicine
